::Hot Rod::

He finally arrived in battle.
"Hot Rod, Maximaize!" He transformed to bot mode, and opened fire on
several enemy bots.(Anyone who replys will do.)

::Drillbit::

"So when do we fix the Ark?" DrillBit asked Destructor.
